title: References
text:
Data Carpentry. (2023). SQL databases and R. Data Analysis and Visualisation in R for Ecologists. Available at: https://datacarpentry.org/R-ecology-lesson/05-r-and-databases.html (Accessed: 7 January 2024)
Wickham, H. (n.d.). RSQLite. Available at: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RSQLite/vignettes/RSQLite.html (Accessed: 7 January 2024)
SQLite Viewer Web App. (n.d.). SQLite Viewer Web: A free, web-based SQLite Explorer. Available at: https://sqliteviewer.app/#/ICA_2023.sqlite/table/AssetsDevelopers/ (Accessed: 7 January 2024).
McGuinness, N. (2023). 1_Local_SQLite.R. In 2023_MSC_DataAnalytics_SQL. Available at: https://github.com/nmcguinness/2023_MSC_DataAnalytics_SQL/blob/main/1_Local_SQLite.R (Accessed: 7 January 2024)​
Bevans, R. (2023). Simple Linear Regression | An Easy Introduction & Examples. Scribbr. Available at: https://www.scribbr.com/statistics/simple-linear-regression/ (Accessed: 7 January 2024)
McGuinness, N. (2023). 2023_MSC_DataAnalytics_Shiny_Quarto_Demo. GitHub. Available at: https://github.com/nmcguinness/2023_MSC_DataAnalytics_Shiny_Quarto_Demo (Accessed: 7 January 2024).
McGuinness, N. (2023). 2023_MSC_DataAnalytics_Quarto_Demo. GitHub. Available at: https://github.com/nmcguinness/2023_MSC_DataAnalytics_Quarto_Demo/tree/main (Accessed: 7 January 2024).
